mapper.select: SELECT detailed_code, title, writer, created_at FROM LIST
SELECT detailed_code, title, writer, created_at FROM LIST WHERE code = #{code}
SELECT l.title, l.writer, l.content,c.id, c.comment_writer, c.comment FROM LIST l LEFT JOIN COMMENT c on l.detailed_code = c.board_detailed_code WHERE l.detailed_code = #{code};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIST (password, title, writer, content, code,created_at) VALUES (#{password},#{title},#{writer},#{content},#{category},#{created_at})
mapper.select: UPDATE LIST SET title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, content = #{content}, code = #{category} where detailed_code = #{detailed_code} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT (comment, comment_writer, board_detailed_code) VALUES (#{comment}, #{comment_writer}, #{detailed_code})
